summary: IT Support Specialist with hands-on experience across Office 365, Google Workspace, Active Directory/Azure AD, and endpoint management. I provide global support, troubleshoot complex incidents, and align IT solutions with business goals.
highlights: Administer user accounts, groups, and access policies in Active Directory/Azure AD
Manage Exchange Online, SharePoint, Teams, and licensing in Microsoft 365
Provision and secure endpoints for new hires following policy
Diagnose and resolve network and system issues to minimize downtime
